services.title: REStake.app
services.description: REStake allows validators to auto-compound your staking rewards, and is a full-featured wallet and Authz grant management tool for the whole of Cosmos.

services.title: Cosmos.directory
services.description: Cosmos.directory is an open source data 'hub' for the Cosmos. The intention is to provide APIs and a UI to make multi-chain development easy, and encourage networks, validators and users to keep the data sources up to date.

services.title: Ecologi impact
services.description: We have planted over 10,000 trees and offset 30+ tonnes of carbon thanks to the folks at Ecologi.
